participant_1.background:
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
i love to paint pictures.
i can type 140 words per minute.
i grew up in the projects of chicago.
I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.

participant_2.background:
My family is proud of my decision to become a police officer.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
my son was born completely blind.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a long walk in the park.
Oh nice! I love taking walks in the park. What was the weather like?
It was a beautiful day, sunny and 72 degrees.
That sounds perfect. I grew up in the projects of Chicago so I don't get to enjoy much nature. What did you do for your walk?
I just enjoyed the scenery and listened to music.
Sounds relaxing. I like to write poems and read horoscopes on my walks.
That's interesting! I've never been into horoscopes, but I love to read.
What kinds of things do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I'm particularly interested in history and crime novels.
Oh nice! I love history too.
I'm really interested in the American Revolution.
That's a great period! I love learning about all the different battles and strategies that were used.
Me too! I think it's so fascinating how the war was won.
Yeah, it's really interesting to see how the tides turned in favor of the Americans.
I agree! It's a really inspiring story
